mapper.select: SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.pro_category, t3.mem_name FROM project as t1, (select * from myorder) as t2, member as t3 WHERE t1.pro_id = t2.pro_id AND t2.mem_idx = t3.mem_idx AND t2.pro_id = 2 AND t2.mem_idx = 2;

SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.pro_category, t3.mem_name, t2.order_id FROM project as t1, (select * from myorder group by order_id) as t2, member as t3 WHERE t1.pro_id = t2.pro_id AND t1.mem_idx = t3.mem_idx AND t2.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} order by t2.order_id desc
SELECT mo.order_id, mo.order_date FROM myorder as mo WHERE order_id = #{order_id} limit 1
SELECT pro_end, pro_name FROM project as pro, myorder as mo WHERE mo.pro_id = pro.pro_id AND mo.order_id = #{order_id} limit 1
SELECT mem.mem_name FROM project as pro, myorder as mo, member as mem WHERE pro.pro_id = mem.mem_idx AND pro.pro_id = mo.pro_id AND mo.order_id = #{order_id} limit 1

SELECT ri.reward_id, ri.reward_title, ri.reward_description, ri.reward_price, ri.reward_option_detail FROM reward_item as ri, myorder as mo where mo.reward_id = ri.reward_id AND mo.order_id= #{order_id}
